price: 38. Oobbaa kee mabul manxu keenik (koros kinnuk) gibdii Qhiyaamah ayroy cisab kee galtoh nee fan yamaatoonu waana, kinnih immay korosuy daalimiinih tani ta-asaaku addunyal cakkik baxxaqqa-le makoh addat tan.
arabic: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا لَٰكِنِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: asmiʿ bihim wa-abṣir yawma yatūnanā lākini al-ẓālimūna al-yawma fī ḍalālin mubīnin
